context_bundle.summary: Robot Rumble (CodeClash.ai) - Turn-based grid battle where you program robot teams. 100 turns, 60s execution limit per turn. Python/JavaScript supported. Destroy enemy robots while protecting yours. Each turn: receive state, output moves/attacks.

onboarding.quick_start: Each turn your code receives game state (robot positions, health, grid). Return actions: move(direction) or attack(target). Win by eliminating all enemy robots within 100 turns.
common_patterns: State parsing: Extract ally/enemy positions from input
Distance calculation: Manhattan distance for targeting
Action priority: Attack if enemy adjacent, else move toward
Turn counting: Adjust aggression based on turn number
